query.statement:
SELECT A.ZZPJT_ID AS ZZPJT_ID , A.HOGI AS HOGI , CS111.PJT AS PJT , CS111.HNO AS HNO , A.BSTNK AS BSTNK -- 수주문서 파트너 정보 , A.KUNNR AS KUNNR -- 수주문서 파트너 정보 , KNA1.NAME1 AS KUNNR_NM -- 수주문서 파트너 정보 , A.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 수주문서 파트너 정보 , A.LIFNR_NM AS LIFNR_NM -- 수주문서 파트너 정보 , CS111.BSU AS BSU -- 보수 호기 정보 , LFA1.NAME1 AS BSU_NM -- 보수 호기 정보 , CS111.ARA AS ARA -- 보수 호기 정보 , CS111.BPM AS BPM -- 보수 호기 정보 , '' AS BMT , '' AS BGT , 0 AS MG1 , 'A1' AS PST , '' AS SEQ , '' AS FLAG , A.DOC2 AS DOC2 , CS111.SID AS SID -- 승강기번호 FROM (
SELECT A.ZZPJT_ID , A.HOGI , MAX(A.BSTNK) AS BSTNK , MAX(A.KUNNR) AS KUNNR , MAX(A.LIFNR) AS LIFNR , MAX(A.LIFNR_NM) AS LIFNR_NM , MAX(A.DOC2) AS DOC2
FROM (
SELECT A.ZZPJT_ID ,A.VBELN ,A.BSTNK ,B.LIFNR ,C.NAME1 AS LIFNR_NM ,D2.HOGI_ID AS HOGI ,B2.KUNNR ,D1.DOC2 -- 계약 결재문서 번호 FROM SAPHEE.VBAK A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.VBELN = A.VBELN AND B.PARVW = 'Z1' AND B.POSNR = '000000'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS B2 ON B2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B2.VBELN = A.VBELN AND B2.PARVW = 'AG' AND B2.POSNR = '000000'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS C ON C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.LIFNR = B.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST001 AS D1 ON D1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D1.PS_PSPID = A.ZZPJT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST002 AS D2 ON D2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D2.QTNUM = D1.QTNUM AND D2.SEQ = D1.SEQ AND D2.PS_PSPID =D1.PS_PSPID -- 유상청구
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZZPJT_ID = #ZZPJT_ID# AND A.ZZPJT_ID LIKE '%NC%' AND A.AUART = 'ZR13'
) AS A
GROUP BY A.ZZPJT_ID , A.HOGI
) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 AS CS111 ON CS111.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS111.PJT = SUBSTR(A.HOGI,1,6) AND CS111.HNO = SUBSTR(A.HOGI,7,3)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 ON WB010.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010.LGORT = CS111.BSU
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS LFA1 ON LFA1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LFA1.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS KNA1 ON KNA1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND KNA1.KUNNR = A.KUNNR
WITH UR
